code: import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[active,setActive]=useState(false);const toggleScraper=()=>{chrome.tabs.query({active:true,currentWindow:true},tabs=>{chrome.tabs.sendMessage(tabs[0].id,{action:"toggleScraper"},response=>setActive(response.active));});};const getData=()=>{chrome.tabs.query({active:true,currentWindow:true},tabs=>{chrome.tabs.sendMessage(tabs[0].id,{action:"getData"},response=>{setData(response||[]);});});};const clearData=()=>{chrome.tabs.query({active:true,currentWindow:true},tabs=>{chrome.tabs.sendMessage(tabs[0].id,{action:"clearData"},()=>{setData([]);});});};const exportCSV=()=>{if(data.length===0)return;const csvContent="data:text/csv;charset=utf-8,"+["Tag,Text",...data.map(d=>"".concat(d.tag,",\"").concat(d.text,"\""))].join("\n");const link=document.createElement("a");link.href=encodeURI(csvContent);link.download="scraped_data.csv";link.click();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 w-64",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-lg font-bold mb-2",children:"Data Scraper"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleScraper,className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded mb-2",children:active?"Stop Selecting":"Start Selecting"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:getData,className:"bg-green-500 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded mb-2 ml-2",children:"Get Data"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:clearData,className:"bg-gray-500 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded mb-2 ml-2",children:"Clear"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"mt-2 max-h-32 overflow-auto border p-1",children:data.map((d,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:d.tag}),": ",d.text]},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:exportCSV,className:"bg-orange-500 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded mt-2",children:"Export CSV"})]});}export default App;
